thread.title: Giphy Collects Together Thousands of Animated GIFs to Help You Learn Sign Language
thread.title_full: Giphy Collects Together Thousands of Animated GIFs to Help You Learn Sign Language

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Giphy Collects Together Thousands of Animated GIFs to Help You Learn Sign Language
text:
Go to permalink GIF 
Knowing at least a few phrases in American Sign Language is always useful and there are few videos that are a more popular means of learning it than the Sign with Robert series. Giphy has teamed up with Sign with Robert to put together a ton of animated GIFs to help you learn a variety of phrases. Advertisement 
In over 2,000 animated GIFs, you can learn various expressions, emotion phrases, lifestyle phrases, and more. Each animated GIF is coupled with the phrase you’re learning, which has been reviewed by the Sign with Robert team for accuracy. This certainly isn’t enough to learn ASL on its own, but each of these GIFs works something like an animated flash card that can teach you a few things through repetition. You can find the whole collection over on Giphy’s Sign with Robert landing page .
